charges.charge_description: 18:113(a)(3) and 113(a)(6) - Assault with a dangerous weapon, resulting in serious bodily injury   (18:113G.F)
18:113(a)(3) and 1153 - ASSAULT WITHIN SPECIAL MARITIME OR TERRITORIAL JURISDICTION (Assault with a Dangerous Weapon)  (18:113F.F)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 84 months imprisonment, 3 years supervised release with standard and special conditions, $100 special assessment, remand to the United States Marshal. Revocation Judgment filed on 11/9/18: time served, 33 months supervised release, remand to the United States Marshals. Revocation Judgment filed on 1/25/19: 12 months plus 1 day imprisonment, no additional supervision.

charges.charge_description: 18:113(a)(6) and 1153 - ASSAULT RESULTING IN SUBSTANTIAL BODILY INJURY  (18:113G.F)(2)
